name: Makuza Verite
greetingText: I really like your name 😍😍 btw!
wishText: I wish you happiness everyday 😎😍 but a litte mor just for today 😁😁! ;)
textInChatBox: Yee! I remembered something! Today is your bd man 😮🙆‍♂️🧏‍♀️Happy birthday!!  Many many happy bro.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: What a very special day this is! a very brightening one 😉😉  kbs.The day you've started life is so unique as you are ✌🎉. May Many blessings be upon you on this day of happiness 😄😄  and the upcoming year!  #AgewithBlessings 🙏🙏 #ageWithCash . What is say is LIFE SHOULD NOT ONLY BE LIVED BUT ALSO CELEBRATED ,blow a million candles🥂🐱‍🏍🐱‍🏍  Happy new year!!
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again. 😋🤣
